Subject: AO provides flight data
Source Text: The AO must provide correct information before this first E-DPI message, in order to feed Network Operations with consistent SOBT, aircraft registration, and first destination data, as early in time as possible.

Subject: Confirm flight to Network Operations
Source Text: Procedures To check consistency between ATC Flight Plan, Airport Slot and Airport flight data and then confirm the flight to the Network Operations and allow further local processing of the flight.

Source Text: The E-DPI message should not be sent if no or inconsistent information is provided.
